channel.title: Ftp on Ponte Posterum
channel.description: Recent content in Ftp on Ponte Posterum

item.title: Prj701 7 ~ Sales Order XML Parse
item.description: Project 702 ~ Sales Order XML Parse One of the stages in the project is to create a module which provides the functionality of automatically generating a sales order based on the values from an XML file retrived from an FTP server. Before I create a module I am going to create a test-driven example using the standard library ftplib which provides an FTP client, containing the functions (nlist and retrbinary) that are necessary.
